title: Sweetcorn plant

properties.value: Sweetcorn plants are a Farming plant grown at level 20 Farming. Sweetcorn is grown by planting 3 sweetcorn seeds in an allotment patch using a seed dibber. Once planted, the nearby farmer may be paid to watch over the allotment. Payment is 10 jute fibres and optionally may be noted to save you space.

Sweetcorn plants are a Farming plant grown at level 20 Farming. Sweetcorn is grown by planting 3 sweetcorn seeds in an allotment patch using a seed dibber. Once planted, the nearby farmer may be paid to watch over the allotment. Payment is 10 jute fibres and optionally may be noted to save you space.

Planting the sweetcorn seeds gives 17 farming experience. If the farmer does not watch the allotment, then disease in the allotment may be removed using plant cure, or using the Cure plant spell in the Lunar spellbook with level 66 Magic and completion of Lunar Diplomacy (albeit more expensive, this can save inventory space when doing farm runs). However, if left alone, the diseased allotment will die.

Each sweetcorn, when picked, gives 19 farming experience. Once all sweetcorn have been picked, the allotment will be clear for new crops.


Farming info[edit | edit source]

Growth time 60 minutes (6x10 minutes)
Yield 3+ (varies)

'''Sweetcorn plants''' are a [[Farming]] plant grown at level 20 Farming. Sweetcorn is grown by planting 3 [[sweetcorn seeds]] in an [[allotment patch]] using a [[seed dibber]]. Once planted, the nearby farmer may be paid to watch over the allotment. Payment is 10 [[jute fibres]] and optionally may be noted to save you space.

Planting the sweetcorn seeds gives 17 farming experience. If the farmer does not watch the allotment, then disease in the allotment may be removed using [[plant cure]], or using the [[Cure plant]] spell in the [[Lunar]] spellbook with level 66 Magic and completion of [[Lunar Diplomacy]] (albeit more expensive, this can save inventory space when doing farm runs). However, if left alone, the diseased allotment will die.

Each [[sweetcorn]], when picked, gives 19 farming experience. Once all sweetcorn have been picked, the allotment will be clear for new crops.
